arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ كُنْ لِوَلِيِّكَ الْحُجَّةِ ابْنِ الْحَسَنِ
فِيْ هٰذِهِ السَّاعَةِ وَفِيْ كُلِّ سَاعَةٍ
translation: In the name of Allah, The Beneficent, the Merciful
O Allah bless Muhammad and his family
O Allah, be, for Your representative, the Hujjat (proof], son of Al'Hassan,
Your blessings be on him and his forefathers,
in this hour and in every hour,
until You make him live on the earth, in obedience (to You],
and cause him to live in it for a long time.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
fī hādhihis sā`ati wafī kulli sā`ah
